text: The following lists events that happened in 1957 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== Kristján Þór Júlíusson *3 March - Atli Eðvaldsson, footballer *22 March - Þorsteinn Bjarnason, footballer *9 April - Oddný Guðbjörg Harðardóttir, politician. *24 June - Lilja Rafney Magnúsdóttir, politician. *30 June - Ólafur Jóhannesson, footballer *15 July - Kristján Þór Júlíusson, politician *15 July - Sigurlás Þorleifsson, footballer ===Full date missing=== *Ásgeir Helgason, scientist ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1950s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1957 in Iceland
